sentences.english: This is the website for Department of Medicine, University of Western Ontario .
sentences.chinese: 這是西安大略大學醫學系的網站。

sentences.english: Right at the end of the show, she was also a medical student.
sentences.chinese: 在該劇的最後，她還是一名醫學系的學生。

sentences.english: The hospital nearby is attached to our medical department.
sentences.chinese: 附近那所醫院附屬於我們醫學系。

sentences.english: Nope. It's actually a poser for medical students, who we hope all know the correct answer.
sentences.chinese: 不，事實上，這是一道針對醫學系學生的問題。

sentences.english: UMIT attends to set up medical informatics specialty in Heibei Software Institute.
sentences.chinese: 擬在河北軟件職業技術學院設立計算機醫學系。

sentences.english: I suggest you apply for the medical faculty of our college.
sentences.chinese: 我建議你申請我們學校的醫學系。

definition: student of a senior high school
excelling both in morals and studies (idiom); top marks for studies and for behavior (at school)/a paragon of virtue and learning
